metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23437 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The package pillow 5.2.0 and before 8.3.2 are vulnerable to RegularExpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the getrgb function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23437` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pillow package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.7').
